parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Finishes loading screen started by [[startLoadingScreen]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Use [[BIS_fnc_endLoadingScreen]] to prevent potential usage conflicts.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[endLoadingScreen]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[startLoadingScreen]] ["Loading My Mission"];
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>code</value></part></template>
[[progressLoadingScreen]] 0.5;
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>code</value></part></template>
[[endLoadingScreen]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>this structure prevents error-prone or lengthy code to miss [[endLoadingScreen]].</value></part></template>
[[private]] _maxTime = [[diag_tickTime]] + 30; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>max 30s of loading</value></part></template>

[[startLoadingScreen]] ["Loading"];
[[private]] _handle = [] [[spawn]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>code that may crash or take too long</value></part></template>
};

[[waitUntil]] { sleep .01; [[scriptDone]] _handle <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> [[diag_tickTime]] > _maxTime };
[[endLoadingScreen]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[startLoadingScreen]], [[progressLoadingScreen]], [[BIS_fnc_endLoadingScreen]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
